sourcesContent:
function MatchLine(props) { const matchData = props.matchData let dateString = matchData?.time const dateObject = new Date(dateString); const formattedTime = dateObject.toLocaleTimeString("en-US", { hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", hour12: true }); return (
{matchData.home.name}
{formattedTime}
{matchData.away.name}
Full Time
) } export default MatchLine
